title: InstantiateMsg
description: Contract instantiation message containing all configuration parameters.

admin.description: Initial admin address for the contract who can update settings

allowed_finality_providers.description: Optional list of BTC public keys (hex) to pre-populate the allowlist at instantiation

bsn_activation_height.description: Rollup block height at which the BSN system is activated (0 = immediate activation). Only affects `SubmitFinalitySignature` messages.

bsn_id.description: Unique identifier for the BSN (Bitcoin Supercharged Network) this contract secures

finality_signature_interval.description: Interval between allowed finality signature submissions. Signatures can only be submitted at rollup block heights where `(height - bsn_activation_height) % interval == 0`.

max_msgs_per_interval.description: Maximum messages allowed per finality provider per interval

min_pub_rand.description: Minimum number of public randomness values required in commitments

rate_limiting_interval.description: Number of Babylon blocks in each interval
